tool_description: api that makes developer add blog posts to be seen by other developers and interact with it  by like/dislike and comment/reply
title: Developers Articles

api_list.name: Get topic articles
api_list.description: now if we want to get all articles that belongs to specific topic
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://developers-articles.p.rapidapi.com/articles/topic-articles/{topicid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "developers-articles.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
